alert.note: Alert for Central Middlesex County; Northern Bristol; Southern Worcester; Western Norfolk (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 25 at 11:51PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A thunderstorm will move across northern Rhode Island and portions of central and eastern Massachusetts through 1230 AM EDT... At 1150 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a thunderstorm over Thompson, or 18 miles west of Woonsocket, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Little to no impact from hail is expected. Locations impacted include... Framingham, Woonsocket, Cumberland, Natick, Franklin, Milford, Walpole, Mansfield, Easton, Lincoln, Westborough, Grafton, Sudbury, Sharon, Killingly, Foxborough, Webster, Ashland, Bellingham and Burrillville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed.

area.areaDesc: Central Middlesex County; Northern Bristol; Southern Worcester; Western Norfolk
